system.description: At 14th level you always have the flesh to stone spell prepared and it doesn’t count against your number of prepared spells. It counts as a cold spell for you and you can cast it without expending a spell slot at 6th level once per long rest. It turns the creature into ice rather than stone, though this ice does not melt normally.
system.prerequisite: Level 14 Witch Class; Winter Witch archetype
